description:
It's Christmas time at the Divine Bitches' dungeon and Mistress Chanel Preston expects to be showered with gifts. Jimmy Bullet arrives to the Armory empty-handed. Thankfully, Mistress Preston has her gimp boy along for the fun. Jimmy is devastated when he realizes his Christmas gift to his Mistress will be entertaining her by sucking gimp dick. Jimmy protests at first but is whipped and fucked in the ass, into submission!
Merry Christmas, slave boys!
title: A Merry Coerced Cock-Sucking Christmas
